bibl.title: Demotic Papyri and Ostraca from Qaṣr Ibrīm (Texts from Excavations. Thirteenth Memoir.)
bibl.note: P. dem. Qasr Ibrim 1-40. - Section One: Papyri [Nos 1-11]. - Section Two: Ostraca [Nos 12-40]. - See No. 35, Fragment A (p. 55, fig. 45): parts of two lines, the first in Demotic and the second in Greek (perhaps the name Δίδυμος).
bibl.seg: RAY J.D., Demotic Papyri and Ostraca from Qasr Ibrim. (Texts from Excavations. Thirteenth Memoir.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2005, 4°, xii-62 pp., 51 figg. ISBN 0-85698-158-3.

P. dem. Qasr Ibrim 1-40. - Section One: Papyri [Nos 1-11]. - Section Two: Ostraca [Nos 12-40]. - See No. 35, Fragment A (p. 55, fig. 45): parts of two lines, the first in Demotic and the second in Greek (perhaps the name Δίδυμος).
